vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Διονύσιος, -ου, ὁ
Dionysius, an Athenian: Act.17:34.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.17.34
§ Dionysius, "belonging to Dionysus"
Dionysius, (Proper name), Acts 17:34*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
丟尼修 这个陽性專有名詞在希腊文的意思是 "奉獻給酒神"
一名雅典人, 亞略巴古的成員, 被保羅感化轉信基督 (徒 11:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
丢尼修 这个阳性专有名词在希腊文的意思是 "奉献给酒神"
一名雅典人, 亚略巴古的成员, 被保罗感化转信基督 (徒 11:34)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Đê-ni: là một thành viên hội đồng A-rê-ô-pa
